column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.1
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Segmentstructural|Category
#T_SP=webanno.custom.EXT|SEG

#Text=A method of preparing a crystal of a metal oxide , characterized in that the growth of said crystal is performed in a liquid phase having a composition which is different from said metal oxide and which comprises components constituting said metal oxide , said liquid phase containing a solid phase at a position different from the position at which the crystal of said metal oxide grows , said solid phase having a composition different from that of said metal oxide and supplying components constituting said metal oxide to said liquid phase .

#Text=A method as set forth in claim 1 , wherein the growth of the crystal of said metal oxide is performed using an axially elongated body of a seed crystal while rotating said elongated body about the axis thereof .
#Text=A method as set forth in claim 2 , wherein said seed crystal has corrosion resistance to said liquid phase .
#Text=A method as set forth in claim 2 or claim 3 , wherein said seed crystal is selected from SmBa 2 Cu 3 O 7-x crystal , magnesia single crystal and YBa 2 Cu 3 O 7-x crystal .

#Text=A method as set forth in any one of claims 2-4 , wherein said elongated body is axially moved upward during the growth of the crystal of said metal oxide and wherein the orientation of said seed crystal relative to the axis of said elongated body is controlled .
#Text=A method as set forth in any one of Claims 2-5 , wherein the rotational direction of said elongated body is periodically reversed .
#Text=A method as set forth in any one of Claims 2-6 , wherein the rotational speed of said elongated body is reduced with the growth of the crystal of said metal oxide .

#Text=A method as set forth in any one of Claims 2-7 , wherein the rotational speed of said elongated body is controlled according to the weight of the crystal of said metal oxide which is monitored with a load cell .
#Text=A method as set forth in any preceding claim , wherein the crystal of said metal oxide is decomposed to solid and liquid when fused .
#Text=A method as set forth in any preceding claim , wherein said metal oxide is a superconductive metal oxide .
#Text=A method as set forth in any preceding claim , wherein said superconductive metal oxide is a Y-series 123 metal oxide .
#Text=A method as set forth in Claim 11 , wherein said solid phase is a Y-series 211 metal oxide .

#Text=A method as set forth in Claim 12 , wherein said solid phase-containing liquid phase is obtained by blending said Y-series 211 metal oxide with at least two members selected from a Cu oxide , a Ba oxide and a BaCu oxide to form an admixture , said admixture being heated at a temperature sufficient to precipitate a crystal of said Y-series 123 metal oxide .
#Text=A method as set forth in Claim 13 , wherein the ratio of the weight of said Y-series 211 metal oxide to the total weight of said at least two members is 1:2 to 10:1 .
#Text=A method as set forth in any preceding claim , wherein said position at which the crystal of said metal oxide grows is maintained at a temperature not higher than that of said solid phase .

#Text=A method as set forth in any preceding claim , wherein said position at which the crystal of said metal oxide grows is a top surface of said liquid phase and wherein said solid phase is present at the bottom of the liquid phase .

#Text=A method as set forth in any preceding claim , wherein said position at which the crystal of said metal oxide grows is maintained at such a temperature that the crystal of said metal oxide is kept stable .

#Text=A method as set forth in any preceding claim , wherein the growth of the crystal of said metal oxide is performed in an oven which is maintained in an atmosphere having a low oxygen partial pressure so as to obtain a single crystal of a tetragonal system .
#Text=A method as set forth in any preceding claim , wherein the crystal of said metal oxide is a single crystal or a polycrystal .
